slides.name: slide-01
slides.promo: Start to control your money using Chrono Wallet removing intermediates e.g. banks, and making your funds and transfers under your control, fast and safe.

slides.name: slide-02
slides.promo:
Chrono Wallet is a gate to the global block-chain network, controlled by all the participants including you.

Block-chain is an innovative, anonymous and the most safe technology of storing digital money and transactions. The network data is stored on each participants’ computers and syncing on every update. The transaction confirmation system makes block-chain network the most secure in the world up-to-date.

slides.name: slide-03
slides.promo:
We do not store any login, funds and transactions data on our servers for your safety.

You may use the network being anonymous. All your transactions will be reflected as an address with received or sent funds.

Consider your address as your personal bank account. Double checking of an address you are sending to is a good idea!

slides.name: slide-04
slides.promo:
Chrono Wallet will generate the following for you:

Private key to access the network. The private key is a file secured by password on your device.

12 words password (Mnemonic Key), which is just an another method of storing your private key. Copy this password on a paper and keep it in a safe place. Both file and mnemonic key can be used to restore your account if something will go wrong.

Addresses to deposit and withdraw funds. You may give the receiving address to other network participant, so they can send you money. You will also use another address to send funds.

slides.name: slide-05
slides.promo:
Don't give your private key to to services you don't trust.
Giving your private key to un-trusted services or people will result in loosing your money.

Check URL address in your browser
Whether you're accessing our site directly from browser or from email and social media link, always check our website address — chronowallet.chronobank.io

Be careful by sending your funds to other people.
Deal with people you trust, as you normally do with your bank accounts.

slides.name: slide-06
slides.promo: Thank you for your time and we're excited to have you on board!
